sentence.Network_en: For battle they wore a cuirass ( breastplate ) , helmet, and greaves.
sentence.Network_cn: 战场上,他们身着重装胸 甲, 头盔和护胫甲.

sentence.Network_en: Get out the breastplate and body - cover , and come together to the fight.
sentence.Network_cn: 你们要预备大小盾牌, 往前上阵.

sentence.Network_en: Be a breastplate to me , and give me your help.
sentence.Network_cn: 拿着大小的盾牌, 起来帮助我.

list.abs: there IS NO NEED FOR DEBATE TO CONTINUE … OR TO HAVE EVEN BEGUN , declared a majestic angel with robes of royal red and a shining breastplate upon which the image of an upturned sword blazed .“这场争辩无需持续……甚至……无需开始。”一位身着皇家红色长袍的大天使庄严地说道，华丽的胸甲映射着他那柄火焰般的宝剑。

entry.def: A breastplate is a piece of armour that covers and protects the chest.

means.word_mean: 1. armor plate that protects the chest; the front part of a cuirass
